content.prompt: Based on the diagram above, which of the following describes the short-run equilibrium?

choices.label: The economy is operating at full employment.
The economy is operating below full employment.
The economy is operating above full employment.
There will be downward pressure on the price level.

topic.text: 3.5: Equilibrium in the Aggregate Demand-Aggregate Supply (AD-AS) Model

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
